description:
Prince Hata`s past is revealed along with the history of Planet Okoku. Can Katsura and Hasegawa really get them on Earth`s side?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Men Must Live Not Long nor Thick, but Hard
Otoko wa Nagaku mo Futoku mo Naku Kataku Ikiro
Un homme ne doit pas avoir une vie longue ou grosse, mais ferme
男は長くも太くもなく硬く生きろ
